params._pokerTokenAddress: address of the PokerToken ERC20 contract

params._coupon: coupon value, whose hash must have been previously registered by calling registerCoupon

params._couponHash: hash of the coupon to be registered

params._suspended: true if faucet is to be suspended, false otherwise

getRequestFundsAmount().notice: Retrieves the currently specified amount to be transferred when requesting network funds (ETH)

getRequestTokensAmount().notice: Retrieves the currently specified amount to be transferred when requesting tokens

isSuspended().notice: Retrieves whether the faucet is currently suspended

registerCoupon(bytes32).notice: Registers a new coupon using its hash

requestFunds(address).notice: Requests the currently specified amount of network funds (ETH) for the specified address

requestTokens(address).notice: Requests the currently specified amount of tokens for the specified address

setRequestFundsAmount(uint256).notice: Specifies the amount to be transferred when requesting network funds (ETH)

setRequestTokensAmount(uint256).notice: Specifies the amount to be transferred when requesting tokens

setSuspended(bool).notice: Sets whether the faucet is currently suspended

userdoc.notice: Contract for controling distribution of POKER tokens to the public
